name: Augment Summoning
text: Your summoned creatures are more powerful and robust.
benefit: Each creature you conjure with any summon spell gains a +4 enhancement bonus to Strength and Constitution for the duration of the spell that summoned it.
mythicText: Your summoning spells bring not mere ordinary beasts, but instead mythic creatures.
mythicBenefit: Any creature you summon using a summon spell is considered mythic for the purpose of interacting with other mythic creatures. It doesn’t gain any mythic abilities or power, but is affected by mythic spells and abilities as if it were a 1st-tier mythic creature. Additionally, if the creature summoned has damage reduction, its damage reduction becomes DR/epic.
text_zh: 你的召唤生物将更加强健有力。
benefit_zh: 你用召唤法术召唤的任何生物获得力量和体质的+4增强加值。
mythicText_zh: 你的召唤法术呼唤来的并非普通野兽，取而代之的是神话生物响应了你的呼唤。
mythicBenefit_zh: 你使用召唤法术召唤出的任何生物，在与其他神话生物进行互动时，被算作是神话生物。这并不会赋予它们任何神话能力或力量，不过在被神话法术或能力影响时，它们就如同1阶神话生物一般。除此之外，若被召唤的生物具有伤害减免，它的伤害减免会变为DR/传奇。
